TmsFlexOptimization¶

Initialization¶

  • Python

    from simnibs import opt_struct
opt = opt_struct.TmsFlexOptimization()

  • MATLAB

    opt = opt_struct('TmsFlexOptimization');

Attributes¶

class simnibs.opt_struct.TmsFlexOptimization(matlab_struct=None)¶

Class that defines a TMS flex optimization

date¶

Date and time when the session struct was initiated

Type:

str

fnamecoil¶

Name of coil file

Type:

str

pos¶

Definition of the coil position

Type:

sim_struct.POSITION

subpath¶

path to m2m folder

Type:

str

fnamehead¶

file name of mesh

Type:

str

path_optimization¶

path where the simulation should be saved

Type:

str

eeg_cap¶

Name of eeg cap (in subject space)

Type:

str

method¶

The optimization method ‘emag’ or ‘distance’

Type:

str

roi¶

The target region of interest for the ‘emag’ optimization

Type:

RegionOfInterest

Parameters:

matlab_struct ((optional) scipy.io.loadmat()) – matlab structure
